channel.title: Unicorn Services Ltd
channel.description: Recent content on Unicorn Services Ltd

item.title: Croydon Mosque
item.description: Phase 3 opening event, Unicorn Services was invited as the principle contractor, Mayor of Croydon Councillor Bernadette Khan also attended the event.

item.title: Old Kent Road
item.description: 4 floors refurbishment plus 50m extension for a total of 86 hotel rooms Construction cost: £3.7m Start: May 2013 End: Jul 2016

item.title: Travelodge Peckham
item.description: A five-story, 56-bed hotel to be built in the center of Peckham. The work involves the demolition of the existing two-story, low-rise block where the Peckham High Street Post Office and another two businesses are located, and the construction of the proposed block from the foundation.

item.title: Northolt Road
item.description: Refurbishment of 50 En-suite bedrooms Construction cost: £2.4m Start: Apr 2010 End: Nov 2011

item.title: Warner Road
item.description: New build 4 storey building containing (9 x 3 Bed Flats) Construction cost: £2.6m Start: Oct 2016 End: Oct 2018

item.title: Chevening Road
item.description: New build 4 storey building containing (9 x 3 Bed Flats) Construction cost: £2.6m Start: Oct 2016 End: Oct 2018

item.title: Interior Refurbishment
item.description: Unicorn Services Ltd was founded in 2008. We offer a full range of building contractor services and property maintenance; from design and project management to cost engineering and M&E services. We always aim to deliver the highest quality work to our customers.

item.title: Contact Us
